Application.Repository

Interface VisionRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Vision,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Vision,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Vision,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Vision>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Vision,java.lang.Integer>

    public interface VisionRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Vision,java.lang.Integer>
    An interface to manage the data access to the Vision table.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Corti Lorenzo, Tocchetti Andrea

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Collection<Vision> findByIdUser(java.lang.String user_id, int scenarioId)
      Returns the list of the Vision(s) of the User with the provided unique identifier within the provided Scenario.
      java.util.Optional<Vision> findByLastUser(java.lang.String user_id)
      Returns the last Vision created by the Scenario with the provided unique identifier.
      java.util.Collection<Vision> findByNotIdUser(java.lang.String user_id, int scenarioId)
      Returns the list of the Vision(s) not owned by the User with the provided unique identifier within the provided Scenario.
      java.util.Optional<java.util.Collection<Vision>> findByPictureId(int pictureId)
      Returns the list of Vision(s) with the provided picture identifier.
      java.util.List<Vision> findByScenario(int scenarioId)
      Returns the list of Vision(s) associated with the Scenario with the provided unique identifier.
      java.util.List<Vision> findByScenarioLimit(int limit, int scenarioId)
      Returns a limited list of Vision(s) associated with the Scenario with the provided unique identifier.
      java.util.Optional<Vision> findByScenarioNotOwnedAndPlayed(int scenarioId, java.lang.String user_id)
      Returns a Vision to prepare a new unique Match for the User with the provided unique identifier within the provided Scenario.
      java.util.Optional<java.util.Collection<Vision>> findMatch(java.lang.String user_id, int pictureId)
      Returns a Vision to prepare a Match for the User with the provided unique identifier.
      java.util.Optional<java.util.Collection<Vision>> findMatchSameScenario(java.lang.String user_id, int pictureId, int scenarioId)
      Returns a Vision to prepare a Match for the User with the provided unique identifier within the provided Scenario.
      java.util.Collection<Vision> findRecentVisions(java.lang.String user_id, int limit)
      Returns the list of the latest Vision(s) of the User with the provided unique identifier.

      • findByScenarioLimit

        @Query(value="SELECT * FROM vision WHERE scenario = :scenarioId ORDER BY id_vision DESC LIMIT :limit",
       nativeQuery=true)
java.util.List<Vision> findByScenarioLimit(@Param(value="limit")
                                                                                                                                                                           int limit,
                                                                                                                                                                           @Param(value="scenarioId")
                                                                                                                                                                           int scenarioId)
        Returns a limited list of Vision(s) associated with the Scenario with the provided unique identifier.
        Parameters:
        limit - The amount of Vision(s) to collect.
        scenarioId - The unique identifier of the Scenario.
        Returns:
        a limited list of Vision(s) associated with the Scenario with the provided unique identifier.

      • findMatch

        @Query(value="SELECT * FROM vision tV WHERE tV.cookie != :user_id AND tV.picture = :pictureId AND tV.id_vision NOT IN(SELECT M.vision_challenger FROM matchmaking AS M, vision AS V WHERE M.vision_challenger = V.id_vision AND M.vision_challenger = tV.id_vision)",
       nativeQuery=true)
java.util.Optional<java.util.Collection<Vision>> findMatch(@Param(value="user_id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          java.lang.String user_id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          @Param(value="pictureId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          int pictureId)
        Returns a Vision to prepare a Match for the User with the provided unique identifier.
        Parameters:
        user_id - The unique identifier of the User.
        pictureId - The unique identifier of the picture of the Vision.
        Returns:
        a Vision to prepare a Match for the User with the provided unique identifier.

      • findMatchSameScenario

        @Query(value="SELECT tV.* FROM vision tV JOIN scenario s ON tV.scenario = s.id_scenario WHERE s.id_scenario = :scenarioId AND tV.cookie != :user_id AND tV.picture = :pictureId AND tV.id_vision NOT IN(SELECT M.vision_challenger FROM matchmaking AS M, vision AS V WHERE M.vision_challenger = V.id_vision AND M.vision_challenger = tV.id_vision)",
       nativeQuery=true)
java.util.Optional<java.util.Collection<Vision>> findMatchSameScenario(@Param(value="user_id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        java.lang.String user_id,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        @Param(value="pictureId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        int pictureId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        @Param(value="scenarioId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        int scenarioId)
        Returns a Vision to prepare a Match for the User with the provided unique identifier within the provided Scenario.
        Parameters:
        user_id - The unique identifier of the User.
        pictureId - The unique identifier of the picture of the Vision.
        scenarioId - The unique identifier of the Scenario.
        Returns:
        A Vision to prepare a Match for the User with the provided unique identifier within the provided Scenario.

      • findByScenarioNotOwnedAndPlayed

        @Query(value="SELECT * FROM vision WHERE scenario = :scenarioId and cookie != :user_id AND id_vision NOT IN (SELECT vision_challenger FROM matchmaking WHERE player = :user_id) ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1",
       nativeQuery=true)
java.util.Optional<Vision> findByScenarioNotOwnedAndPlayed(@Param(value="scenarioId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              int scenarioId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              @Param(value="user_id")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.String user_id)
        Returns a Vision to prepare a new unique Match for the User with the provided unique identifier within the provided Scenario.
        Parameters:
        scenarioId - The unique identifier of the Scenario.
        user_id - The unique identifier of the User.
        Returns:
        A Vision to prepare a new unique Match for the User with the provided unique identifier within the provided Scenario.
